channel.title: Banner request
channel.description:
Hello all
I need a banner for tihs site I am making...really important.
size : 640 x 110 Words: ISLAM WAVE
please make it darkish...and the background MUST BE BLACK.
tell me if you need any more info.
thanx

Read full topic

item.title: Banner request
item.dc:creator: @yna_ajhear5 yna_ajhear5
item.description:
@yna_ajhear5 wrote:

King:

[quote author=Slayerexpert link=topic=206.msg8583#msg8583 date=1143953939]
Hitler and the Nazis stole the symbol from some African or something tribe. They didn't make it up, the leechers =P

i thought it was actually based somewhat off of the buddhist symbol for peace... which is the the swastika in the opposite direction... and aj's was the best imho[/quote]

Thank you king. It's an honor to hear that.

ALSO, If anyone has any questions on Hitler and WWII, feel free to ask me because I plan on majoring in history and I have been studying WWII for year.

Read full topic

item.title: Banner request
item.dc:creator: @yna_ajhear5 yna_ajhear5
item.description:
@yna_ajhear5 wrote:

arraness14:

[quote author=yna_ajhear5 link=topic=206.msg2792#msg2792 date=1142022443]
[quote author=arraness14 link=topic=206.msg2785#msg2785 date=1142018174]
[quote author=yna_ajhear5 link=topic=206.msg2721#msg2721 date=1141961042]
Why the hell would I be interested in helping you now that you have made yourself a hypocrit and have riticuled me. I have much better things to do, like make a banner for Fagex and actully get somthing for it, as well as be complimented, rather than make some shitty banner for a no-name site that won't exist in a month. I took the inishitive and made one for you to your specefications and I get flamed for it. Good Luck EVER getting help from me agian, however good/bad it may/will be.

All I was saying is dont call other people noobs when you yourself are posting shitty banners. I would suggest you do make banners for 'no name' sites to sharpen up your skills because no one is going to give you anything for your banners at the stage you are at.
[/quote]

And how can you tell what stage I am at with ONE banner that I didn't even try on?!

False accusations piss me off, but I don't care what you think, because you mean nothing to me. So good lucking finding another banner (could just make it yourself...lazy)

I'm done arguing.
Later
~AJ~
[/quote]

I was not aruguing in the first place. Just proving my point that you are more of a noob then the people who actualy did make good banners.

I still think you need to brush up your skills or stop calling other people noobs.

Because no matter how long you took on that banner..Your not good.[/quote]
Stop flaiming me. I'm done with this. I don't care how you think of me.

CASE CLOSED. DROP IT.

Read full topic

And please remember to keep it dark
